mdRecord.dcterms:title: "How to Read Finger Prints", cut; 06 of 09
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 39-42; "How to Read Finger Prints"; Dr. Garson specifically describes the fingerprint science, including classification of arches, loops, and whorls. Full page article with illustrations and a short introductory author biography. This is a copy of page 13, item 010-036, only it is cut to fit the page(s) instead of the full issue.; by J. G. Garson, Daily Express; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Classification
